Text: Victory Square, Minsk:  The square is located in the historic centre of Minsk nearby with the museum of the 1st Congress of RSDRP, Main offices of National State TV and Radio and City House of Marriages.

<Text: Victory Square, Minsk:  A green park stretches from the Victory Square to the river of Svislach and to the entrance to the M. Gorky Park.>
Triplets:<Victory Square

<Text: Victory Square, Minsk:  Victory Square is the key landmark of Minsk.>

Text: Victory Square, Minsk:  The newly married traditionally take their picture at the square.

<Text: Victory Square, Minsk:  Victory Square is the Belarusian version of Red Square in Moscow in the Russian Federation.>
